attachments_processed.text:
MakerSpace
Design Lab
INTRO TO THREE.JS
This workshop will demonstrate how to build a landing page with 3D elements and scroll interactions. The website will be bundled using Vite, stored in a Git repository and deployed on Netlify.
Monday, Dec 1st 12:00pm to 2:00 PM bit.ly/DLMSLuma
